lead_paragraph: A "Day For Night(mare)" inspired by Kafka, the Marx Brothers, and fifteen years of experience in low-budget filmmaking prompt this tale--a film within a film--which examines the anxieties and mishaps that can befall the creatures of low-budget pictures.
